cast.overview: When eccentric candy man Willy Wonka promises a lifetime supply of sweets and a tour of his chocolate factory to five lucky kids, penniless Charlie Bucket seeks the golden ticket that will make him a winner.
cast.title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory

details.biography: George Claydon was born on 4 September 1933 in Bristol, England, UK. He was an actor, known for The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (1967), The Last Days of Pompeii (1984) and I Don't Want to Be Born (1975). He died on 4 October 2001 in Hammersmith, London, England, UK.
details.name: George Claydon
